actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize testimony by employees of the Senate in Senator William S. Cohen, et al. v. Donald Rice, Secretary of the Air Force, et al.

summary.text: Authorizes Dale Gerry and Robert J. Carolla (Senate employees) to testify in Senator William S. Cohen, et al. v. Donald Rice, Secretary of the Air Force, et al., except concerning matters for which a privilege should be asserted.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony by employees of the Senate in Senator William S. Cohen, et al. v. Donald Rice, Secretary of the Air Force, et al.
